store

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.Store

  • public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the functionality to set up the Store object. Please note this class uses a Singleton design pattern in order to ensure only 1 store can exist
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jacob Bullock

      private Store()
      The Store constructor is made private to prevent instantiation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Store

        private Store()
        The Store constructor is made private to prevent instantiation. using the singleton design patter, the next method below getInstance will ensure only one instance of Store can be created
